description:
Not only is Jonouchi’s soul captured, but before this episode is over, another of our loved ones will also lose his or her soul! Also, it’s a rematch between the Pharaoh and Rafael – but this time, the Pharaoh doesn’t have Yugi to protect him!  Is the Pharaoh still haunted by his devastating loss at the hands of Rafael? He better pull himself together, for Rafael is taking off the kiddie gloves and unleashing even more powerful guardians than before!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aux prises avec le gardien - 1re partie
Duel of Destiny! Yugi vs Rafael
Unmei no Duel! Yuugi vs Raphael
運命の決闘[デュエル]! 遊戯VSラフェール
